name: Lion’s Tail
preparation:
One of the great forgotten cocktail ingredients, allspice dram (sometimes called pimento dram), is experiencing a revival. Here it is in a classic cocktail made with bourbon and fresh lime juice.

Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake for 10 to 15 seconds.

Strain into a coupe or cocktail glass.

Lightly express the oil from an orange peel over top.
